SLEAutoNameInfo: Enables auto-naming while saving parts, assemblies and drawings files in 3DEXPERIENCE for the first time. It applies to all applications authoring Solid Edge data.
SLEReplaceTitleByNewNameOnAutonameLabel: Replace Title By New Name On Autoname
SLEReplaceTitleByNewNameOnAutonameInfo: On selection of autoname on save dialog, the existing filename will be replaced by the autoname.
SLECADAttributeMappedToEINInfo: When value for this attribute is specified,then the function will be enabled and we will stamp CAD file with this attribute and its value would be the EIN of the Physical Product.
SLEEnablePessimisticLockingInfo: Enabling this feature ensures that data cannot be saved to the platform from the connector unless it is reserved by the current user.
